description:
Where is the discipline? The Order? The Servitude? These slaves are outta control, breaking rules, flaunting protocols, generally embarrassing the shit out of this House! We need to restore order, and the Steward taps former consort Iona Grace to do just that. But first she has to impress the Household and earn back her House Leathers.
Her first task is to show the little tramp Adrianna Luna how we like to see dicks sucked and cocks fucked on the Upper Floor. Is Grace up to the task? Is Luna to undisciplined to perform on the Upper Floor? You Decide.
title: Discipline Lost Part Two
